title: Binance Processes Nearly $1B in Net Outflows as Changpeng ‘CZ’ Zhao Resigns
description: Data shows the exchange sits on over $67 billion worth of tokens, easing concerns of a possible bank run.

title: Banrupt crypto lender Genesis sues Gemini to recover $689M worth of 'Preferential Transfers'
description:
Genesis claims Gemini made preferential transfers of about $689,302,00 from Genesis and wants the court to "correct this unfairness."

Crypto lending platform Genesis Global Capital has filed a lawsuit against cryptocurrency exchange Gemini Trust to recover $689 million in preferential transfers, a court filing on Nov. 22 shows.

The lawsuit alleges that Gemini made preferential transfers of approximately $689,302,000" from Genesis at the expense of other creditors and requested the court to correct the unfairness.

The two crypto giants have been embroiled in a public feud after the collapse of the FTX crypto exchange over the recovery of funds that escalated into lawsuits.

Earlier, Gemini filed an adversary proceeding against bankrupt Genesis on Oct. 27 to use 62,086,586 shares of Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC). These shares were used as collateral to secure loans made by 232,000 Gemini users to Genesis through the Gemini Earn Program. The collateral value grew to $1.6 billion as per current market conditions.

This is a developing story, and further information will be added as it becomes available.

title: Binance CEO Granted Residency in UAE Amidst Legal Proceedings
description:
Binance founder Changpeng Zhao will be permitted to remain in the United Arab Emirates while awaiting sentencing scheduled for next year. The concession came after Zhao pleaded guilty to violating U.S. anti-money laundering laws, resulting in a $4.3 billion settlement and his resignation. The details of the court proceedings were revealed in a tweet by […]
